aka: すもうどうさむらいをつぐものたち
this_title: 相撲道 サムライを継ぐ者たち
trans_title: すもうどうさむらいをつぐものたち
introduction: Although sumo is a cherished part of Japanese culture, few have managed to get a behind-the-scenes look at the sport. Director Eiji SAKATA had the opportunity to spend six months in close contact with two sumo stables. In the process, he managed to capture fascinating footage of the rigorous training sessions and daily life of the wrestlers.
foreign_title: 相撲道 サムライを継ぐ者たち
